properties.entry:
You can apply the following filters to the report:
  • Device Group(s) - Select one to many device groups to filter the results.
  • Status - Select any test event status to filter the results.
    • Confirmed Success (Green) - The devices in this category have reported receiving the unique RF broadcast performance message for the selected day.
    • Confirmed Missed (Orange) - The devices in this category have reported all available data for the selected day and the analysis has determined the unique broadcast performance message was not received by the device.
    • Unreported (Grey) - The devices in this category have not reported all available data for the selected day and the analysis is unable to determine the success or failure of the unique broadcast performance receipt for the device. When the data is received, the device will re-categorized appropriately.
Click on the Filter button to filter the results.
The resulting devices will display in a table with the total count of filtered devices.
Click on the Gear Icon next to the device count to view options you can do for the filtered device collection (Collection Actions, Map Devices, Download data and Inventory Action).
Click on the Gear Icon next to each device to view options you can do for the individual device (Collection Actions, Inventory Action and Map Devices).
